title: ErgoMixer Token
summary: ErgoMixer Token is a new token minted by @anon2020s with the ID `83c473e4ad477b1921023f61ab5bd1550a242c287475ff1c804f029d97672ae7`. Holders of this token will be eligible for an airdrop of the final ErgoMixer token when it is ready. The tokenomics of the final token are not yet clear, but a percentage of the tokens will be airdropped to community members, privacy and mixer related dapps, related tutorials, dapps and wallets integrating with the mixer, appkit development, and the Ergo DAO. The document references the ErgoProfitSharingDapp and a forum post on the ErgoMixer tokenization.

qa_pairs.question: What is the token ID of the ErgoMixer Token?
qa_pairs.answer: The token ID of the ErgoMixer Token is `83c473e4ad477b1921023f61ab5bd1550a242c287475ff1c804f029d97672ae7`.

qa_pairs.question: What is the name of the ErgoMixer Token?
qa_pairs.answer: The name of the ErgoMixer Token is 'FEMX', Future ErgoMixer Token.

qa_pairs.question: Who has minted the ErgoMixer Token?
What are the holders of the ErgoMixer Token eligible for?
qa_pairs.answer: Holders of the ErgoMixer Token are eligible to be airdropped the ErgoMixer's token when it is ready.

qa_pairs.question: What are some of the entities that will receive a percentage of the final ErgoMixer token?
qa_pairs.answer: The final ErgoMixer token will be airdropped to community members, privacy and mixer related dapps, related tutorials, dapps and wallets integrating with the mixer, appkit development, and the ergo DAO.

sections.heading: ErgoMixer Token
sections.content:
@anon2020s has minted a new token, 'FEMX', Future ErgoMixer Token.
Token Id: `83c473e4ad477b1921023f61ab5bd1550a242c287475ff1c804f029d97672ae7`

Holders of this token are eligible to be airdropped ErgoMixer's token when it is ready.

The tokenomics of the final token is not clear yet. Still, whatever it comes to be, they will airdrop some percentage of the tokens to community members, privacy and mixer related dapps, related tutorials, dapps and wallets integrating with the mixer, appkit development, ergo DAO, etc.

- [ErgoProfitSharingDapp](https://github.com/mhssamadani/ErgoProfitSharingDapp)
- [2021: ErgoMixer Tokenization ](https://www.ergoforum.org/t/ergomixer-tokenization/648)
